xal.extension.bricks

Interface ViewNodeContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BrickListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RootBrick, ViewNode

    public interface ViewNodeContainer
extends BrickListener
    interface of nodes which can contain view nodes
